summary.p: A mathematical function that returns the angle, in radians, whose tangent is a specified double expression; also called arctangent.

returns.p: An angle, θ, measured in radians, such that -π/2 ≤ θ ≤ π/2,
-π/2 rounded to double precision (-1.5707963267949) if value equals NegativeInfinity,
π/2 rounded to double precision (1.5707963267949) if value equals PositiveInfinity.

examples.sampleCode: SELECT 'The ATAN of the angle -181.01 is: ' + TO_STRING(ATAN(-181.01)) UNION ALL SELECT 'The ATAN of the angle 0 is: ' + TO_STRING(ATAN(0)) UNION ALL SELECT 'The ATAN of the angle 0.1472738 is: ' + TO_STRING(ATAN(0.1472738)) UNION ALL SELECT 'The ATAN of the angle 0.1472738 is: ' + TO_STRING(ATAN(0.1472738)) UNION ALL SELECT 'The ATAN of the angle 197.1099392 is: ' + TO_STRING(ATAN(197.1099392))
